briefTitle: Clinical Trial Comparing Outcomes of Breast Conserving Operations With Classic v High-frequency Electrocoagulation
officialTitle: Prospective, Randomized Clinical Trial Comparing Pain Sensation, Seroma Formation and Quality od Life Following BCT With SLND in Breast Cancer Patients Operated With Classic Versus High-frequency Electrocoagulation.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* female
* age 18-100
* breast cancer
* stage IIA and II B (cT1a-3; cN0-1; cM0)
* no previous breast surgery
* no previous cancer
* obtained informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* stages I, III, IV
* localised breast infection
* previous breast surgery for any cause
* previous cancer
* no voluntary consent
